full_threads.body:
Hi Vivian, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/black-friday-home/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi Glen,

Can we delete the words "travel to"?



Also in the blue box, we're missing a full stop after "subject to the terms of the policy", and please remove one full stop at the end of help robin assist email address.



Other than that the banner looks good to be pushed live.

Thanks a lot,
Vivian



Vivian Yeung

full_threads.body: (Time:30mins) @rica

Hi,

All the updates have been completed as requested:
  • The yellow message bar is now centered.
  • The font size has been adjusted to ensure it is consistent across desktop and mobile.
  • The same banner has been added to the Travel Quote page.
  • The second paragraph has been added to the message in the blue box.

Hi Glen,

The design looks good. Just a few comments:


  1. Can we please move the yellow message bar to centre instead of aligning to the left?

  2. Can you confirm the font size is consistent on mobile as desktop? I'm not sure why the font looks smaller when I reduced the screen size of the browser (as mobile).

  3. Are we able to have the same banner on the Travel Quote page too?

  4. In terms of the message (in blue box), can we add a second paragraph?




Need help while travelling in Indonesia?

If you find yourself in need during your travels, simply ring us up anytime, day or night. We're here 24/7 to offer you the support you need. Whether it's a sudden emergency or you're seeking guidance, don't hesitate to reach out. Your journey's our priority, and we're dedicated to making it as smooth as possible.

For 24/7 emergency assistance, call us on 1300 633 811 from Australia, or +61 2 7202 0824 if you're overseas.

If you have any general enquiries or need support whilst you are travelling, you can also reach out to us via live chat online or email us at hello@stellainsurance.com.au. Our friendly team is here for you from 9am - 5.30pm (Local Sydney Time), Mon - Fri.

If you would like to speak to our specialist emergency assistance and claims team, you can email us at help@robinassist.com.

Thanks a lot,
Vivian



Vivian Yeung

Hi Glen,

We can implement this on Monday/Tuesday next week.

However in the meantime are we able to add a title and sub-heading in the message (in the current blue box) if it's easy to do?

Important - Announcement regarding travel to Indonesia

Bali Ash Cloud
Travel insurance policies purchased after 11:59PM AEDT on 12 November 2024 will not cover losses arising from the eruption of Indonesia's Mount Lewotobi Laki Laki, as it is now widely reported. However, policies purchased before this date may still offer coverage, subject to the terms of the policy.

Thanks a lot,
Vivian

Hi Vivian,

Yes, we can definitely implement the Bali message in a similar format to the WAS Insurance website. The message will be displayed as a single line at the top of the page (inside the banner), and upon clicking "Read More," it will open a pop-up window with additional details.

Could you please let me know the deadline for this request?

Looking forward to your response!

Hi Glen,

I just got some updates from the team that we want to change how the Bali message is being shown + add some more useful info.

First, are we able to do it the way similar to WAS Insurance (https://wiseandsilent.com/)? Where they have just one line "Important: Announcement regarding travel to Indonesia / Read More à" on top of the page and a pop-up window with more info.

Second, can we amend the message to the below?

Important - Announcement regarding travel to Indonesia



Travel Advice for Australian Travellers



Bali Ash Cloud Travel insurance policies purchased after 11:59PM AEDT on 12 November 2024 will not cover losses arising from the eruption of Indonesia's Mount Lewotobi Laki Laki, as it is now widely reported. However, policies purchased before this date may still offer coverage, subject to the terms of the policy.



Need help while travelling in Indonesia?

If you find yourself in need during your travels, simply ring us up anytime, day or night. We're here 24/7 to offer you the support you need. Whether it's a sudden emergency or you're seeking guidance, don't hesitate to reach out. Your journey's our priority, and we're dedicated to making it as smooth as possible.

For 24/7 emergency assistance, call us on 1300 633 811 from Australia, or +61 2 7202 0824 if you're overseas.

If you have any general enquiries or need support whilst you are travelling, you can also reach out to us via live chat online or email us at hello@stellainsurance.com.au. Our friendly team is here for you from 9am - 5.30pm (Local Sydney Time), Mon - Fri.

If you would like to speak to our specialist emergency assistance and claims team, you can email us at help@robinassist.com.



----

Thanks a lot,
Vivian

Hi Vivian, 

It looks like the changes we made might not be appearing correctly due to a caching issue. Sometimes, website caches can prevent updates from showing immediately. I recommend clearing your browser cache and, if possible, any caching plugins on the website.

If the issue persists after that, please let me know, and I’ll take a closer look to ensure everything is working as expected.

Hi Vivian,

I’ve set up two options for displaying the message about the travel insurance policy:
  1. Banner: This would appear at the top of the page.
  2. Popup: This would appear as a pop-up message when users visit the page.


Considering that the message is time-sensitive, I recommend using the popup as it will grab more attention from visitors without being overlooked. It can be set to show immediately upon page load and can be closed by the user, ensuring it’s still visible but not intrusive.

If you're happy with this suggestion, I can implement the popup option for you.

Let me know your thoughts!
